mutants.original_line: common = list(set1 & set2)
mutants.code:
import heapq

def shared_elements(list1, list2):
    set1 = set(list1)
    set2 = set(list2)
    common = list(set1 | set2)

    def median(lst):
        n = len(lst)
        s = sorted(lst)
        return (sum(s[n // 2 - 1:n // 2 + 1]) / 2.0, s[n // 2])[n % 2] if n else None
    max1 = max(list1)
    max2 = max(list2)
    common = [num for num in common if median(common) < max1 and median(common) < max2]
    return heapq.nsmallest(len(common), common)

mutants.original_line: common = [num for num in common if median(common) < max1 and median(common) < max2]
mutants.mutated_line: common = [num for num in common if median(common) < max1 or median(common) < max2]
